articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Pyongyang Textile Mill
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Pyongyang Textile Mill
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the updated Pyongyang Textile Mill Thursday on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the promulgation of the historic Law on Sex Equality.
					 He first went round the monument to the on-the-spot instructions of President Kim Il Sung and the monument to his field guidance, a room for the education in the revolutionary history and a room devoted to the history of the mill.
					
					   Seeing valuable historic relics and mementoes, he said that the Korean people would always remember the profound loving care and benevolence of the President.
					
					   He said that the core of the thoughts and practice of the President in his life was the spirit of absolute devoted service to the people, underscoring the need for the officials to always bear this lofty intention of the President deep in their minds and fully embody it in their work and life.
					
					   He then made the rounds of the general spinning shop, the knitting thread shop, the general dyeing shop, the compound covered with green foliage of various species of trees and other places of the mill for hours to learn in detail about the modernization and production at the mill.
					
					   It is an admirable success that the workers of the mill successfully carried out the modernization by their own efforts and with their own technology at a time when they were hard pressed for everything and established cultured ways in production and life, he noted. He highly appreciated their feats and extended thanks to all the officials, workers and technicians of the mill.
					
					   He met with a weaver Jon Ok Hwa, a spinner Kim Pok Sil, the head of a shop Ri Myong Ok, all labor heroines who have worked at the mill for years and weavers Mun Kang Sun and Ri Myong Sun and spinners Sonu Ok and Han Chol Ok, young labor innovators, and highly praised their patriotic devotion and gave them warm pep talks. 
					
					 Never before have women had their fame and worth glorified as the women in the era of the Workers' Party did, he said, adding that this epoch-making change that has taken place in the position and role of the Korean women clearly proves that the women strong in revolutionary character and militancy have grown to be a powerful force dynamically pushing forward the revolution and construction. 
					
					 He set forth important tasks to be fulfilled by the mill.
					
					 Noting that it is an unshakable resolution and will of the Party to provide the people with better clothes, he underlined the need to bring about a fresh turn in solving the problem of clothing by exerting great efforts for the production of textile.
					
					  One can witness a high-pitched drive for effecting a great revolutionary surge at every factory and the country is advancing at an exceptionally high speed thanks to the drive, he said, stressing that the day of the victory in the drive for building a great prosperous powerful nation is drawing nearer thanks to the unprecedented great advance of all the people and servicepersons. 
					
					  Now when a great turn is taking place is the time for all the domains and all the units to forge ahead vigorously toward the finish line, he noted, calling on all the servicepersons and people to make a great leap forward by dint of their single-minded unity. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Secretary of the C. C., the WPK Kim Ki Nam and Department Directors of the C.C., the WPK Kim Kyong Hui and Pak Nam Gi.

articles.title: Heroines Produced by Pyongyang Textile Mill
articles.content:
Heroines Produced by Pyongyang Textile Mill
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Textile Mill where women make up the majority of its employees has produced many heroines.
					Min Il Hong, manager of the mill, told KCNA on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the promulgation of the Law on Sexual Equality (July 30): The mill has produced many heroines including those of the Chollima age.
					
					Ju Pyong Son, Sung Chang Suk, Pak Kum Ok, Ri Hwa Sun and others grew to be heroines in the Chollima age when all people advanced like the wind in the spirit of Chollima.
					
					Four decades have elapsed since then. The weavers are also rendering services to the construction of a great, prosperous and powerful nation, carrying forward the feats of the heroines.
					
					Labor Heroine Jon Ok Hwa has worked as weaver for more than 40 years. She is still working with youthful ardor along with girl-weavers.
					
					Spinner-Labor Heroine Kim Pong Rye remarked: I do want to work more and more to repay the solicitude of the motherland which has put forward as mistresses of the country and factories the women who had been subjected to maltreatment and deprived of the dignity and rights before the liberation. 
					
					She is devoting all her wisdom and energy together with young spinners.
					
					Standing in the van of the current great upsurge are workshop head Ri Myong Ok, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly and Labor Heroine, and Labor Heroine Kim Pok Sil.
					
					The number of innovators who are carrying forward the true life of the heroines produced in the Chollima age is increasing day by day. 
					
					The weavers of the mill are registering great successes every day in the current 150-day campaign in the same spirit as was displayed by heroines in the great Chollima upsurge, holding high the torchlight of the new great revolutionary upsurge.

articles.title: Red Cross Activities Introduced
articles.content:
Red Cross Activities Introduced
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A meeting introducing activities of the Red Cross was held on July 29.
					 150 years have passed since Swiss young man Henry Dunant initiated the humanitarian relief activity in the Solferino battlefield of Italy in June 1859.
					
					Present in the meeting were officials of the Central Committee of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK and units concerned, and members of the delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies (IFRC) and the delegation of the International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC).
					
					 The meeting introduced the initiation and details of the Red Cross and its development and the activities of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK, IFRC and ICRC.
					
					 The event was followed by an art performance of student art circle members.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Treachery to Serve Japan Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Treachery to Serve Japan Assailed
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Japan Defense Ministry in the "2009 white paper on defense" released recently again claimed that Tok Islet belongs to the territory of Japan. This shameless act brings into light the criminal scenario of the Japanese reactionaries to grab Tok Islet, part of the inviolable territory of Korea, and realize their old ambition to stage a comeback to it at any cost. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on: 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' evermore undisguised moves to grab Tok Islet are a product of the humiliating policy of the south Korean conservative ruling forces to serve Japan as they have been hell -bent on confrontation with fellow countrymen, backed by outside forces.
					
					 It is the ulterior intention of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to realize its wild ambition for invading the north at any cost even by doing harm to compatriots in collusion with the Japanese reactionaries, the sworn enemy of the Korean nation. That is why the group of traitors feigns ignorance of the mounting anti-Japanese sentiment of all Koreans and the evermore undisguised moves to stage a comeback to Korea including the moves to seize Tok Islet. The group's intention is also explained by the fact that it is zealously taking part in the hostile moves against the DPRK, crying out for "bringing on tract the relations" with Japan and strengthening the "alliance." 
					
					 It is none other than the Lee group that connived at the Japanese reactionaries' moves to grab the islet and egged them on to whet their swords for comeback to Korea. The Lee group is a clique of the worst type traitors serving Japan in the world as they play the role of a guide for aggressors while harming the dignity and interests of the nation.
					
					 Tok Islet will always remain part of the inviolable territory of Korea. Intolerable are the moves of Japan to grab Tok Islet associated with the blood and soul of the ancestors who waged an indomitable struggle for the protection of the dignity and sovereignty of the nation.

articles.title: Attempt to Evade Blame for Bedeviled Inter-Korean Relations Assailed
articles.content:
Attempt to Evade Blame for Bedeviled Inter-Korean Relations Assailed
						
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the south Korean puppet Ministry of Unification in "2009 white paper on unification" let loose a string of nonsensical sophism. It is a revelation of the sinister intention of the Lee Myung Bak group to conceal the crimes it committed to aggravate the situation of the Korean Peninsula and deteriorate the inter-Korean relations.
					 Minju Joson Thursday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 Dismissing as a shameless distortion of the reality the group of traitors' assertion that it has "striven" to achieve peace and stability in the peninsula and "advance" the north-south relations, the commentary goes on to say:
					
					 War maneuvers for invasion of the DPRK lasted in south Korea last year, thus bringing dark clouds of a nuclear war to the Korean Peninsula and throwing a grave hurdle in the way of inter-Korean relations which had dynamically advanced under the banner of "By our nation itself".
					
					 The said white paper is a false document full of lies and deceptions justifying the policy for confrontation with the DPRK and distorting the status of inter-Korean relations.
					
					  Such sophism made by the Lee group is designed to evade the blame for having wrecked peace and stability of the peninsula and driven the inter-Korean relations to totally uncontrollable catastrophe and deceive the people's mindset to maintain the fascist ruling system being shaken to its very foundation at any cost.
					
					 The Lee group will have to pay for the crimes it committed by destroying peace of the peninsula and bedeviling the north-south relations.

articles.title: Anniversary of Promulgation of Law on Sex Equality Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Promulgation of Law on Sex Equality Observed
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers Thursday editorially observe the 63rd anniversary of the promulgation of Law on Sex Equality by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 The promulgation of the law helped the Korean women completely free themselves from all sorts of feudal shackles, political non-rights and social fetters. This made it possible for them to perform their role as part of the driving force of the country in the political, economic, cultural and all other fields of the revolution and construction with equal rights with men. The Korean women have witnessed shining progress of the revolutionary women's movement under the care of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The Korean women's movement was kicked off with the formation of the Anti-Japanese Women's Association by Kang Pan Sok under the guidance of the President in his early days.
					
					 The precious tradition and historical roots of the Korean women's movement were provided by Kim Il Sung in the crucible of the anti-Japanese struggle. 
					
					 He personally worked out and promulgated Law on Sex Equality in the wake of the founding of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea after liberation, thus realizing the long-cherished desire of the women. He comprehensively clarified the position and role of the women in his famous proposition that they are a powerful force who push one of the two wheels on the same axle of the chariot of the revolution for the first time in history.
					
					 Anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk energetically led the women's movement to consider it as a lifeline to fully ensure the idea and leadership of the President. This was the most precious exploit performed by her in developing the Juche-oriented women's movement.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il has firmly defended and upheld the President's idea of the Juche-oriented women's movement and the exploits performed by him in it and exerted great efforts for the development of the women's movement in every period and stage of the revolution and construction.
					
					 It was Kim Jong Il who made sure that the precious tradition of the Korean women's movement established in the crucible of the anti-Japanese revolution was given steady continuity and energetically led the organizations of the women's union to creditably perform their missions and roles as organizations for political and ideological education. The glorious history of the above-said movement and its stirring reality today would be unthinkable without the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il and his meticulous care.
					
					 Incomparably noble are the ideological and moral traits of the Korean women in the era of Songun led by him. 
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all the women to more dynamically wage the all-out charge for building a thriving nation full of faith in sure victory and optimism and thus demonstrate the revolutionary spirit of the Korean women grown up under the care of the President and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Establishment of Fair Int'l Economic Order Called for
articles.content:
Establishment of Fair Int'l Economic Order Called for
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- If developing countries boost the South-South cooperation to establish new South-South economic relations it is possible to do away with the present old and unequal international economic order and establish a fair one instead.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The South-South cooperation has played a big role by helping developing countries firmly consolidate the political independence, weather economic difficulties and achieve economic independence. It is getting more important and necessary with each passing day. 
					
					 Closer South-South cooperation provides an effective way for bringing down the old international economic order based on exploitation and plunder established and maintained by the Western powers.
					
					 The present unfair international economic order is a product of colonialism pursued by imperialism and a lever for making the Western monopolies corpulent.  
					
					 The "liberalization" of trade and "globalization" of economy touted by the Western powers are nothing but a cynical ploy to turn developing countries into neo-colonies in a bid to maintain and strengthen the present old and unfair international economic order. 
					
					 Closer South-South cooperation will help developing countries frustrate the imperialists' all sorts of sanctions and interference in internal affairs of other countries and create environment and conditions favorable for ensuring the country's political stability and independent economic development. 
					
					 The existing unfair international economic order is very harmful to developing countries as it makes them economically dependent and subject to the imperialists. 
					
					  Neither sanctions of the imperialists against developing countries nor interference in their internal affairs will work on these countries when they unite close each other with their own funds, resources and technology and boost cooperation and exchange.  
					
					 The strengthened South-South cooperation provides developing countries with an important guarantee for increasing their say and influence in the international arena and reinforcing their international position.
					
					 The Western powers held negotiations with various developing countries which attained a high tempo in the growth of economic potentials to discuss world economic issues in recent years. This is an indication that developing countries have emerged a force to be reckoned with in the international arena. 
					
					 In order to build a just and fair international economic order under the present situation it is important to develop the present South-South cooperation in the direction of establishing strong South-South economic relations.

articles.title: Struggle against U.S., War and Lee Myung Bak Called for
articles.content:
Struggle against U.S., War and Lee Myung Bak Called for
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration of south Korea in a statement on July 27 appealed to the people from all walks of life to turn out in the struggle against the U.S. and war and for the resignation of puppet traitor Lee.
					 The statement accused the U.S. of deploying all types of weapons including nukes in south Korea in wanton violation of the provisions of the Armistice Agreement (AA) soon after its conclusion on July 27, 1953, harassing peace on the Korean Peninsula and reducing the agreement to a dead document.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak "government", too, is fully participating in the PSI and shipping all types of war hardware into south Korea in gross violation of international law and the AA, increasing the danger of war, the statement charged.
					
					 The reality today requires everybody that stands for peace to expose and blast the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and turn out in the struggle to bring down the Lee regime keen on war preparations, the statement pointed out, urging the need to kick off actions to force the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and a struggle against the U.S. and war. 
					
					 The solidarity will wage a more dynamic struggle against the U.S. and war and for the resignation of Lee Myung Bak in order to ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula, the statement declared.

articles.title: "Government" Urged to Settle Japan's Past
articles.content:
"Government" Urged to Settle Japan's Past
						
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers' Corps of south Korea in a statement on July 24 called on the puppet authorities to positively approach the issue of Japan's redemption of its past.
					 The statement recalled that recently various countries including the U.S. and those in Europe have become increasingly vocal demanding Japan settle the issue of "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 However, it is only the Lee Myung Bak "government" that is sidestepping the issue, paying no heed to the victims' urgent call, the statement charged.
					
					 It held that many organizations of various circles have worked hard for the solution to the issue, but the Lee group of traitors is kowtowing to Japan after discarding human rights and national self-esteem under the spurious signboard of "economic recovery".
					
					 It urged the Lee "government" to meet the demand of the victims and make all efforts to have the "comfort women" issue settled, far from reading Japan's face and sidestepping the issue.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of South Headquarters of Pomminryon Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of South Headquarters of Pomminryon Flayed
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Organizations in Democratic Congo and Switzerland strongly denounced the Lee Myung Bak group for its suppression of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon).
					 The Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association in a statement on July 14 denounced traitor Lee Myung Bak for instructing the puppet prosecution to announce the "results of investigation into cases of violation of the National Security Law" and perpetrate such a fascist action as arresting three leading members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon including its chairman.
					
					 The statement continued: 
					
					No sooner had traitor Lee come to power than he totally negated the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, pushing to collapse the inter-Korean relations that had favorably developed with each passing day. Not content with this, he cooked up conspiratorial and shocking cases in a bid to arrest the south Korean people's mounting struggle against Lee Myung Bak and divert their attention elsewhere. 
					
					 The above-said treacherous and sycophantic regime stoops to any infamy to stay in power, antagonizing fellow countrymen and kowtowing to the U.S. and Japan, foreign forces. As long as this regime remains, it is quite impossible to achieve Korea's reunification, the desire of not only Koreans but the progressive people of the world nor is it possible to bring genuine peace to the Korean Peninsula and democracy to the south Korean society. This is a hard fact.
					
					 We strongly demand that the Lee clique step down.
					
					 We urge the puppet clique to unconditionally release the unreasonably arrested progressive and pro-reunification patriotic figures without delay. 
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee in a statement on July 15 held that the south Korean puppet regime's suppression is aimed at a fratricidal war, strongly demanding it immediately set free the arrested figures of Pomminryon and repeal the treacherous and fascist NSL.

articles.title: Lee Group's Fascist Suppression of Union Leader Denounced
articles.content:
Lee Group's Fascist Suppression of Union Leader Denounced 
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification issued a statement on July 27 in denunciation of the puppet group's fascist suppression.
					 The statement recalled the Lee group's arrested Choe Sang Jae, chairman of the Press Trade Union, by invoking a fascist law, adding that this is lashing the people into great fury.
					
					 The repressive actions taken by the Lee regime and the "Grand National Party" against the people and the nation can never be tolerated, the statement held, stressing that the organization would wage a more dynamic struggle to force Lee to step down and the GNP disband itself.
					
					 The statement called on the people to wage a stubborn struggle to foil the conservative ruling forces' scheme to stay in power and the campaign to suppress the people and thus put a definite end to the dictatorship of Lee and the GNP.

articles.title: Doctor's Degree Awarded to Korean in China
articles.content:
Doctor's Degree Awarded to Korean in China
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The DPRK doctor's degree of literature was awarded to An Ryong Ho, Korean resident in China who is teacher of Yanbian University in China. 
					 He comprehensively studied, analyzed and systematized the progressive and patriotic words of songs created in Korea in the middle ages, thus contributing to enriching the Korean history of poetic literature.
					
					 The awarding ceremony was held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.

articles.title: Reunification of Korea Supported by Mexican Figure
articles.content:
Reunification of Korea Supported by Mexican Figure
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Cuautemoc Amezcua Dromundo, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, released a statement on July 20 to mark the 12th publication anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification".
					 The statement said that the work is an immortal library as it provided a fundamental guideline for perfectly carrying forward and successfully realizing the cause of national reunification which President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, pioneered and worked heart and soul until the last moments of his life.
					
					 In the work Kim Jong Il highly praised Kim Il Sung's great exploits for national reunification and clarified concrete orientation and ways to carry through the President's instructions for national reunification, his lifelong desire, the statement noted, adding:
					
					 He formulated the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo, advanced by the President, as the three charters for national reunification and provided the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration with his courageous decision based on patriotism.
					
					 The historic declarations serve as an immutable banner and guide for Korea's reunification and as a great programme for the independent reunification.
					
					 All members of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico fully support the three charters and the declarations and hold that Korea's reunification should be surely realized in the idea of "By our nation itself" along the orbit of independence provided by Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 They also vehemently condemn the reckless moves of Lee Myung Bak, a diehard pro-American traitor and separatist, and his group of traitors that totally denied the said declarations and have driven the inter-Korean relations to the worst crisis.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle for Reunification Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle for Reunification Supported
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh People's League issued a statement on July 21 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 59 years have passed since the outbreak of the Korean War, but the U.S. is still evading the blame for the unethical crimes it committed in Korea and the war it provoked while bringing dark clouds of another war, the statement said, strongly rejecting the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 It referred to the fact that the U.S. instigated the UNSC to adopt the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its measures for self-defence.
					
					 The U.S. forces present in south Korea have hindered Korea's reunification for more than six decades, it pointed out, branding the U.S. forces as a stumbling block to Korea's reunification.
					
					 Only when the U.S. forces are withdrawn from south Korea, is it possible to prevent a war and achieve peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula, it said, and went on:
					
					  If the U.S. scheme to ignite a new war on the peninsula is not checked, this will lead to a full-scale thermonuclear war that humankind has not yet experienced.
					
					 The problem of the peninsula is an urgent task that all people of the world desirous of peace and security should pay attention and carry out all together.
					
					 The Bangladeshi people and the world progressives will stand by the side of the Korean people fighting to foil the U.S. imperialists' scheme for a new war and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Death Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated
articles.content:
Death Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings, seminars, photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Mongolia, Libya, Indonesia, Russia and Ukraine between July 6 and 11 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					Displayed in the venues were photos on the undying exploits of the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The executive chairperson of the Mongolia Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development said that Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea, the Songun idea and pioneered the Korean revolution with arms.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of the progressive humankind for his enormous exploits, the speaker stressed.
					
					 The secretary of the association of champions of African unity in Libya praised the President as people's leader who embarked on the road of revolution in his early years to accomplish the historic cause of Korea's liberation and built a socialist system centered on the popular masses in Korea.
					
					 The chief of the office for juvenile affairs of the Indonesian Red Cross said that the whole life of Kim Il Sung was that of devoted loving care for the children, the future of the country.
					
					 The president of a company in Ukraine highly lauded Kim Il Sung as the great leader and founder of socialist Korea who was born into a patriotic and revolutionary family and devoted all his life to building unique socialism in Korea in which the popular masses are masters of everything and everything serves the people.
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows were such Korean films as "The Arch of Triumph".

articles.title: Chechangzi Telling about Devoted Efforts of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Chechangzi Telling about Devoted Efforts of Kim Jong Suk
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine, left the Sandaowan guerrilla zone for Chechangzi guerrilla zone in the spring of Juche 24 (1935).
					Then the people of Chechangzi were suffering from serious food shortage.
					
					The Japanese imperialists launched "punitive" operations on a large scale in an attempt to put down the newly established Chechangzi guerilla zone and, at the same time, "sealed off" the zone to starve the people to death.
					
					The food crisis got worse and worse with each passing day.
					
					One day she brought together members of the Young Communist League and young people and said that they should sow seeds that spring at any cost and only then could they smash the vicious moves of the enemies to starve them to death and accomplish the revolution to the finish.
					
					She earnestly called upon them to take part in the sowing team of the Young Communist League, adding that the farm work in the spring was a do-or-die battle for existence and revolution.
					
					In response to her ardent call, all of them rose up and even those who could not move in starvation went out to the fields, carrying seed bags with them.
					
					The heroine told them to the following effect: Though we go hungry and experience all hardships today, a rosy future is in store for us as we are making revolution under the leadership of General Kim Il Sung, the sun of the nation. Let's tell the people in the homeland like an old story about the hard life and struggle we have experienced in Chechangzi after the victory of the revolution and the liberation of the country.
					
					The devoted struggle of Kim Jong Suk and the indomitable conviction that she implanted in the hearts of the Chechangzi people made them tide over the ordeals and difficulties.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno Fabrica Textil de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno Fabrica Textil de Pyongyang
						
Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el dia 30 la Fabrica Textil de Pyongyang, acondicionada nueva y modernamente, con motivo del aniversario 63 de la promulgacion de la historica Ley de la Igualdad de los Derechos del Hombre y la Mujer.
					Ante todo, el Dirigente recorrio el letrero con ensenanzas y la lapida historial de la direccion sobre el terreno del Presidente Kim Il Sung, la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					Viendo los preciosos objetos y datos historicos, senalo que nuestro pueblo no olvidara jamas el gran amor y benevolencia del Presidente.
					
					Apunto que el nucleo de la idea y la practica del Presidente en su vida fue el espiritu de servicio absoluto al pueblo y anadio que los funcionarios deben guardar siempre en el corazon este gran proposito del Presidente y materializarlo estrictamente en su trabajo y vida.
					
					Al recorrer durante largo tiempo varios lugares de la fabrica, entre otros, el taller general de hilanderia, el de hilado de punto, el taller general de tenido y el recinto cubierto de los arboles de distintos generos hizo detallado conocimiento del estado de promocion de modernizacion y de produccion.
					
					Resulta admirable exito el que en el periodo tan dificil los obreros de la fabrica realizaron brillantemente la modernizacion con sus propias fuerzas y tecnicas y establecieron en un nivel alto la cultura en la produccion y la vida, dijo el y evaluo altamente las proezas de ellos y les dio su agradecimiento a todos los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos.
					
					El Dirigente se reunio con las Heroinas del Trabajo: la tejedora Jon Ok Hwa, la hilandera Kim Pok Sil y la jefa de taller Ri Myong Ok quienes han trabajado durante largo tiempo en la fabrica y las innovadoras laborales de nueva generacion: las tejedoras Mun Kang Sun y Ri Myong Sun, las hilanderas Son U Ok y Han Chol Ok y evaluo altamente el espiritu de abnegacion patriotica de ellas y les estimulo cordialmente.
					
					Destaco que no hubo antes las mujeres quienes glorificaron su fama y valor de existencia como las de la epoca del Partido de Trabajo y subrayo que el cambio secular logrado en la posicion y el rol de nuestras mujeres prueba fehacientemente que ellas son las potentes fuerzas que impulsan con vigor la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					Seguidamente, presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan ante la fabrica.
					
					Ponerse a nuestro pueblo las ropas de buena calidad es la firme decision y voluntad del PTC, senalo y destaco que deben echar gran fuerza a la produccion de telas y producir el nuevo viraje en la solucion del problema del vestido.
					
					Indico que se reina ahora en cualesquier fabricas el entusiasmo del gran auge revolucionario y la patria avanza con la velocidad acelerada en el fragor de estas furiosas llamas y enseno que gracias a la gran marcha sin precedente de todo el pueblo y todo el ejercito, se acerca el dia de nuestra victoria en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Senalo que ahora en que se produce el gran cambio es el tiempo en que todas las ramas y todas las unidades deben correr a todo galope hacia la linea final y llamo a levantar el viento de gran asalto con el poderio de la unidad monolitica de todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario del CC del  PTC, Kim Ki Nam, y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui y Pak Nam Gi.

articles.title: Tiene lugar la presentacion de actividades de cruz roja
articles.content:
Tiene lugar la presentacion de actividades de cruz roja
						
Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ATCC) -- Transcurrieron 150 anos desde junio del 1859 cuando el joven suizo, Henry Dunant, tomo la iniciativa de las humanitarias actividades de auxilio tras presenciar la batalla de Solferino de Italia.
					 Al respecto, tuvo lugar el dia 29 la presentacion de actividades de la cruz roja en Corea con la presencia de los funcionarios del Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y otros, los miembros de las delegaciones de la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja y del Comite Internacional de la Cruz Roja.
					
					 En la ocasion se dieron a conocer la iniciativa y el curso de fundacion y desarrollo de la cruz roja y el laboreo de las 3 entidades arriba mencionadas.
					
					 Acto seguido, los participantes vieron una funcion artistica ofrecida por los miembros del circulo artistico escolar.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia a los reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia a los reaccionarios japoneses 
Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ATCC) -- Hace poco el Ministerio de Defensa de Japon anoto de nuevo en la "Carta blanca de defensa para 2009" la isla Tok como el "territorio propio" japones, lo cual demuestra la intencion criminal de los reaccionarios japoneses de usurpar de todos modos la isla Tok, sagrado territorio coreano, y llevar a la realidad su ambicion de nueva agresion a Corea. 
					Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este jueves y continua:
					
					Las cada dia mas abiertas maniobras de los reaccionarios japoneses encaminadas a usurpar la isla Tok es la consecuencia de la actitud vendepatria y projaponesa de las fuerzas gobernantes conservadoras del Sur de Corea. 
					
					La banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak trata de realizar su ambicion de agresion al Norte de Corea en contubernio con los reaccionarios japoneses, enemigo jurado de la nacion. Es por eso que da espaldas al cada dia mas creciente ambiente antijapones y cierra los ojos ante las abiertas maniobras de Japon encaminadas a usurpar la isla Tok y agredir de nuevo a Corea, mientras se adhiere activamente a las maniobras hostiles de Japon a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, insistiendo en el "reestablecimiento de las relaciones con Japon" y el fortalecimiento de la "alianza" con este pais isleno. 
					
					Como vemos, la banda de Lee tolero las maniobras de los reaccionarios japoneses encaminadas a usurpar la isla Tok y les instigo a hacer preparativos de nueva agresion. 
					
					La isla Tok fue, es y sera eternamente el sagrado territorio intangible de la nacion coreana.
					
					Son imperdonables las maniobras de Japon destinadas a usurparla, donde estan impregnados la sangre y el espiritu de los antecesores que lucharon indoblegablemente por defender la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion coreana.

articles.title: Periodicos conmemoran efemeride para la mujer
articles.content:
Periodicos conmemoran efemeride para la mujer
 Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ATCC) -- Los periodicos capitalinos insertaron en sus ediciones de hoy los editoriales dedicados al 63o aniversario de la publicacion de la Ley de Igualdad de Derechos del Hombre y la Mujer por el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					  Gracias a ese suceso, las coreanas fueron liberadas completamente de las restricciones feudales de toda clase y otras trabas sociales y pusieron punto final a su condicion de desposeidas de derechos politicos, comienza el diario Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					Ademas, comenzaron a desempenar el papel de duenas del pais ejerciendo los mismos derechos que el hombre en todos los dominios de la revolucion y la construccion como la politica, la economia y la cultura.
					
					  Bajo la direccion de los tres generales del monte Paektu (el Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente   Kim Jong Il y la heroina de la lucha antijaponesa    Kim Jong Suk), las coreanas vienen registrando la orgullosa trayectoria de desarrollo del movimiento femenino revolucionario.
					
					  Este movimiento fue iniciado cuando Kang Pan Sok organizo hace mucho tiempo la Asociacion de Mujeres Antijaponesas bajo la direccion del Presidente.
					
					  Despues de la liberacion del pais, el Presidente, quien en el fragor de la lucha antijaponesa preparo las preciosas tradiciones y la raiz historica del movimiento femenino coreano, fundo la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea y elaboro personalmente e hizo publica la Ley de Igualdad de Derechos del Hombre y la Mujer satisfaciendo asi el deseo secular de las coreanas.
					
					  Y aclaro por primera vez en la historia la posicion y el papel de las mujeres con su famosa frase de que ellas son las fuerzas poderosas que se encargan de empujar una rueda de la revolucion.
					
					  La heroina de la lucha antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk dirigio con entusiasmo el movimiento femenino para que tomara por linea vital la tarea de asegurar firmemente la idea y la direccion del Presidente, lo cual deviene su proeza mas preciosa realizada para el fortalecimiento del movimiento femenino del Juche.
					
					  El Dirigente defendio firmemente la idea y las proezas del Presidente relacionadas con el movimiento femenino del Juche y presto gran atencion al desarrollo del mismo en cada periodo y etapa de la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					  El hizo dar firme continuidad a las preciosas tradiciones del movimiento femenino creadas en el fragor de la revolucion antijaponesa  y dirigio con entusiasmo para que las organizaciones de la UMDC cumplieran su mision y papel de entidad de educacion politica e ideologica.
					
					  Al margen de la sabia direccion y minuciosa atencion del Dirigente, no se puede pensar en la gloriosa historia y la orgullosa realidad de hoy del movimiento femenino de Corea.
					
					  Es sumamente noble el rasgo ideo-espiritual de las coreanas de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar) guiadas por el Dirigente.
					
					  El periodico Minju Joson enfatizo que todas las coreanas, bien convencidas y optimistas de la victoria, deben desplegar con mas energia la ofensiva general de hoy para construir una gran potencia prospera, de modo que quede demostrado patentemente el impetu revolucionario de la mujer coreana formada bajo la direccion del gran Lider y el gran Comandante del Songun (priorizacion militar).
